title: help please
body:
https://gyazo.com/1c66fdd55465c202caa51ceece557859
when i try to access universe.league 
i have tried firefox and chrome same problem so not adblocker or any of that 
i tried seperate internet on a laptop elsewhere (not my main computer) and it worked fine.
im up for ideas.

replies.body: It looks like the URL you were using may have been incorrect. Try accessing the page using [**this exact link**](http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/). Let me know if this worked!
